fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.heater.mil

Class ExternalTemperatureModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.AtomicModel
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.heater.mil.ExternalTemperatureModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableDefinitionsAndSharingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableInitialisationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.AtomicModelI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.EventsExchangingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExternalTemperatureSILModel

    @ModelExportedVariable(name="externalTemperature",
                       type=java.lang.Double.class)
public class ExternalTemperatureModel
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
    The class ExternalTemperatureModel defines a simulation model for the environment, namely the external temperature of the house.

    Description

    The model makes the temperature vary over some period representing typically a day. The variation is taken as a cosine between Math.PI and 3*Math.PI. The cosine (plus 1 and divided by 2 to vary between 0 and 1) is taken as a coefficient applied to the maximal variation over a day and then added to the minimal temperature to get the current temperature.

    The model reevaluates the external temperature at some predefined rate i.e., the evaluation step. It exports this temperature in a variable called externalTemperature.

    • Imported events: none
    • Exported events: none
    • Imported variables: none
    • Exported variables: name = externalTemperature, type = Double

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       cycleTime >= 0.0 && cycleTime <= PERIOD
 invariant       STEP > 0.0
 invariant       evaluationStep.getSimulatedDuration() > 0.0

    Invariants

     invariant       MeasurementUnit.CELSIUS.equals(HeaterTemperatureI.TEMPERATURE_UNIT)
 invariant       URI != null && !URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       MAX_EXTERNAL_TEMPERATURE > MIN_EXTERNAL_TEMPERATURE
 invariant       PERIOD > 0.0

    Created on : 2023-09-29

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:

        public ExternalTemperatureModel(java.lang.String uri,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit simulatedTimeUnit,
                                fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.AtomicSimulatorI simulationEngine)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        create an external temperature MIL model instance.

        Contract

         pre     uri == null || !uri.isEmpty()
 pre     simulatedTimeUnit != null
 pre     simulationEngine != null && !simulationEngine.isModelSet()
 pre     simulationEngine instanceof AtomicEngine
 post    !isDebugModeOn()
 post    getURI() != null && !getURI().isEmpty()
 post    uri == null || getURI().equals(uri)
 post    getSimulatedTimeUnit().equals(simulatedTimeUnit)
 post    getSimulationEngine().equals(simulationEngine)
        Parameters:
        uri - URI of the model.
        simulatedTimeUnit - time unit used for the simulation time.
        simulationEngine - simulation engine to which the model is attached.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
